akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 104–106, div. D, title XLIII, § 4304(b)(5), Feb. 10, 1996, 110 Stat. 664

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5918. Repealed. Pub. L. 104–106, div. D, title XLIII, § 4304(b)(5), Feb. 10, 1996, 110 Stat. 664
Section, Pub. L. 93–577, § 19, as added Pub. L. 95–39, title IV, § 401, June 3, 1977, 91 Stat. 190; amended Pub. L. 95–91, title III, § 301(a), title VII, §§ 703, 707, Aug. 4, 1977, 91 Stat. 577, 606, 607, related to organizational conflicts.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealFor effective date and applicability of repeal, see section 4401 of Pub. L. 104–106, set out as an Effective Date of 1996 Amendment note under section 2220 of Title 10, Armed Forces.
